languages.text: "Мон-кай лучше прочих понимают язык боли и смерти. Еще пара-другая сотен показных расправ — и самые смелые из вашего числа навсегда покорятся кнуту новой хозяйки".

"Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай лучше прочих понимают язык боли и смерти. Еще пара-другая сотен показных расправ — и самые смелые из вашего числа навсегда покорятся кнуту новой хозяйки".

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “那只猴子比她绝大多数同类更加了解痛苦与死亡的语言。再来几百次屠杀吧，把信息传达出去。这样一来，就算你们之中最勇敢的人，也会彻底拜倒在新任女主人的皮鞭之下。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."

traits.locale_text: “那只猴子比她绝大多数同类更加了解痛苦与死亡的语言。再来几百次屠杀吧，把信息传达出去。这样一来，就算你们之中最勇敢的人，也会彻底拜倒在新任女主人的皮鞭之下。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Les mon-keigh comprennent le langage de la souffrance et de la mort mieux que tout autre. Encore quelques massacres pour bien faire passer le message, et même les plus rebelles se soumettront au fouet de leur nouvelle maîtresse. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."

traits.locale_text: « Les mon-keigh comprennent le langage de la souffrance et de la mort mieux que tout autre. Encore quelques massacres pour bien faire passer le message, et même les plus rebelles se soumettront au fouet de leur nouvelle maîtresse. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Los mon-keigh entendéis el lenguaje del dolor y la muerte mejor que la mayoría. Unos pocos cientos de masacres para asegurarse de que entienden el mensaje y hasta los más valientes se someterán eternamente al látigo de su nueva ama».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."

traits.locale_text: «Los mon-keigh entendéis el lenguaje del dolor y la muerte mejor que la mayoría. Unos pocos cientos de masacres para asegurarse de que entienden el mensaje y hasta los más valientes se someterán eternamente al látigo de su nueva ama».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイは痛みと死の言葉を普通の言葉よりよく理解する。数百人以上の虐殺でメッセージを送れば、一番勇敢な仲間は新しいご主人様のムチに永久に従うだろうよ」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイは痛みと死の言葉を普通の言葉よりよく理解する。数百人以上の虐殺でメッセージを送れば、一番勇敢な仲間は新しいご主人様のムチに永久に従うだろうよ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Chem-Pan-Sey verstehen die Sprache von Schmerz und Tod besser als die meisten. Noch ein paar hundert Massaker, um die Botschaft zu verdeutlichen, dann werden sich auch die Mutigsten von Euch für immer der Peitsche ihrer neuen Herrin beugen."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."

traits.locale_text: "Chem-Pan-Sey verstehen die Sprache von Schmerz und Tod besser als die meisten. Noch ein paar hundert Massaker, um die Botschaft zu verdeutlichen, dann werden sich auch die Mutigsten von Euch für immer der Peitsche ihrer neuen Herrin beugen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."

languages.text: "Mon-keighler acı ve ölümün dilini herkesten iyi anlar. Birkaç yüz katliam daha yapıp lafı gediğine oturtursanız... En cesurlarınız bile yeni hanımlarının kırbacına sonsuza dek boyun eğer."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh understand the language of pain and death better than most. A few hundred more massacres to drive the message home, and the bravest of your number will submit forever to the whip of their new mistress."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighler acı ve ölümün dilini herkesten iyi anlar. Birkaç yüz katliam daha yapıp lafı gediğine oturtursanız en cesurlarınız yeni hanımlarının kırbacına sonsuza dek boyun eğer."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
